name: Bowtie
onCreateCommand: sudo chown -R vscode /var/run/docker.sock; pip install -r requirements.txt -e .
postCreateCommand: for each in $(ls implementations); do docker pull ghcr.io/bowtie-json-schema/$each; sudo cp /workspaces/bowtie/docs/gitpod-motd.txt /usr/local/etc/vscode-dev-containers/first-run-notice.txt; done;
